Title: The Final Resistance
Description:
<Faerin speaks in a hushed, furious whisper.>

Good work. But before we can leave, there's something else. 

Down this way are some powerful priests. I think they are summoning something-- something big. No doubt to strike at us above and drive us from the tower itself.

It will be dangerous, but we must stop them. Are you with me?
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find Faerin and Anduin at the Cliffside Beacon.
RewardText:
<Faerin's eyes are dark with weariness.> 

It never ends, does it?
